titleStmt.title: An order of the right honourable the Commons in high court of Parliament assembled, for appointing a committee of the House, to treat with a committee of the Common-Councell of the city of London, and of the commanders of the souldiers, and commission-officers in the said city; concerning their engagement for the safety and security of His Majesties person, and the Parliament, during the time of the intended personall treaty; with the results of the committee and Common-Councell thereupon. : Die Mercurii, 5. Julii, 1648.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Parliament. House of Commons.
City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the honourable city of London.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
